c74object.name: sb.receive
c74object.description: Smartball specific UDP protocol receiver. Request multicast membership and decode feedbacks from connected Smartballs.

objarg.name: ip
objarg.description: Set the requested mulicast address of the receiver. Address should be a valid IPv4 multicast group address. Default group is set to Smartballs default feedback multicast address: 239.0.0.51.

objarg.name: port
objarg.description: Set the receiving port of the receiver. Default port is set to Smartballs default UDP out port: 9000

entry.name: list
entry.description:
Smartballs feebacks are sent as a max friendly list as described below:
[id] pong:answer to the ping message received by a ball.
[id] bat [val]:balls power supply voltage value every second.
[id] imu tmp [val]:if enabled, temperature sensor value (V) at 100 Hz.
[id] imu acc [x y z]: if enabled, accelerometer xyz values (m/s²) at 100 Hz.
[id] imu gyr [x y z]: if enabled, gyroscope xyz values (dps) at 100 Hz.
[id] imu mag [x y z]: if enabled, magnetometer xyz values (µT) at 100 Hz.
